TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableForChildrenAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: 指定附加屬性具有延伸至邏輯樹狀結構中子項目的可瀏覽範圍。

span.span: Specifies that an attached property has a browsable scope that extends to child elements in the logical tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詞彙的意義`browsable`用於描述這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]相當於指定的描述，附加屬性的可瀏覽狀態和屬性資訊的特別無關，但[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，因為附加的屬性是主要[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. 當這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]套用至附加屬性的 get 存取子這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]指定附加的屬性是可瀏覽附加的屬性擁有者時的其他元素的父項目。When this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is applied to the get accessor for an attached property, this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies that an attached property is browsable when the attached property owner is a parent element of other elements. 當解譯的設計工具所使用型別描述項資訊，設計工具應將新增這個屬性為可瀏覽屬性至邏輯樹狀結構中的所有子項目，根據父項目，與這個[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]套用。When interpreted by a designer that uses type descriptor information, the designer should add this property as a browsable property to all child elements in the logical tree, based on the parent element with this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] applied. 一般而言，可瀏覽狀態平行功能。Generally, the browsable state parallels functionality. 例如，會指定子項目的項目上瀏覽，因為包含程式碼來檢查任何設定值子項目上。For example, is designated browsable on elements that are child elements of a , because includes code for checking any set values of on child elements. 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]父項目位置支援兩種類型的樹狀目錄中偵測模式： 淺層模式和深層模式。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] supports two types of tree detection modes for parent element positions: a shallow mode, and a deep mode. 淺層的模式中，已套用的預設模式 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，緊鄰的父項目必須是可瀏覽附加屬性的順序中的屬性的擁有者類型。The shallow mode, which is the default mode for an applied [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], requires that the immediate parent element be the owner type of the property in order for the attached property to be browsable. 深層模式所套用的屬性宣告做為`true`。The deep mode is declared by applying the attribute with as `true`. 深層模式是較不嚴格，因為它只需要擁有者類型是在邏輯樹狀結構中上, 階方向的某處，並因此附加的屬性是可瀏覽所有的子項目，不只是直接子項目上。The deep mode is less restrictive because it only requires that the owner type be somewhere in the ancestor direction of the logical tree, and therefore the attached property is browsable on all child elements, not just immediate child elements. 附加的屬性使用方式，邏輯樹狀結構中的中間項目不應該報告，則為 true 的父項目會套用深層模式。The deep mode is applied for attached property usages where intervening elements in the logical tree should not be reported as the true parent element. 隱含的集合 (比方說，這是隱含的) 不會被視為是父項目，引導您進行這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]宣告樹狀目錄中偵測模式。Implicit collections (for example, the that is implicit in the of a ) are not considered to be parent elements for purposes of how this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declares the tree detection mode. 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]只會套用在定義附加的屬性的 get 存取子。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. 不套用此[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]set 存取子。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 雖然直覺的方式設定作業正在進行可瀏覽的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]上子項目，它是目前狀態和控制，則為 true 的行為的父項目上的 get 存取子的特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on child elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the parent element that controls the true behavior. 附加的屬性是否可瀏覽的子項目不是絕對保證父項目，以某種方式真的處理附加的屬性值。Whether an attached property is browsable on a child element is not an absolute guarantee that the attached property value is really processed by the parent element in some manner. 此外，值不是絕對保證不會處理範圍，或不會延伸超過直屬父項目。Also, the value is not an absolute guarantee that the processing scope does or does not extend beyond the immediate parent element. 所有這是特定的實作。All this is implementation specific. 不過，這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]報告可瀏覽狀態是最佳可用機制報告的使用量資訊和附加屬性的功能資訊。However, this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] for reporting the browsable state is the best available mechanism for reporting the usage information and functional information for an attached property. 因此，您通常可以假設可瀏覽附加屬性的狀態是類似於如何處理或解譯您的應用程式程式碼中的相關的父元素的子項目之附加的屬性值的行為。Therefore, you can generally assume that the browsable state of an attached property is analogous to the behavior of how an attached property value on a child element is processed or interpreted by the relevant parent element in your application code. 如需宣告的附加屬性的一般資訊，請參閱[附加屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md). ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 這個類型的成員不會通常用於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的預設值為 `false`。The default for is `false`.

span.span: Determines whether the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果指定的 和目前的 相等，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the specified is equal to the current ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作支援的一個可能的可設定值由這個實值相等[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetHashCode () As Integer

summary.span: 傳回這個 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的雜湊碼。

span.span: Returns the hash code for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

returns.span: 32 位元不帶正負號的整數值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作支援這所公開的一個可能可設定值為基礎的兩個可能的雜湊值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports two possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeDescendants { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會宣告是否在已套用這個 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] 的附加屬性上使用深層模式來偵測父項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that declares whether to use the deep mode for detection of parent elements on the attached property where this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is applied.

value.span: 如果具附加屬性之父項目邏輯樹狀結構中的所有子項目皆可瀏覽附加的屬性，則為 。

span.span: if the attached property is browsable for all child elements in the logical tree of the parent element that owns the attached property.

value.span: 如果只有具附加屬性之父項目的直接子項目可瀏覽附加屬性，則為 。

span.span: if the attached property is only browsable for immediate child elements of a parent element that owns the attached property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的屬性所定義的大多數[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]適用於這樣做的預設值是做為`false`。Most of the attached properties defined by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that apply do so with the default of as `false`. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 這個類型的成員不會通常用於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
